meanings.definition: Of or characteristic of a housewife.
meanings.sent1: She had a housewifely demeanor, always keeping the home tidy and welcoming.
meanings.sent2: The housewifely duties included cooking, cleaning, and caring for the family.
meanings.sent3: Her housewifely skills were put to the test when she had to fix the leaky faucet.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed under her housewifely care, like a colorful tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The housewifely touch was evident in every corner of the cozy cottage.

meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of a housewife.
meanings.sent1: She managed the household housewifely, with efficiency and care.
meanings.sent2: She cooked dinner housewifely, following the traditional recipes.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched her housewifely antics with curiosity and amusement.
meanings.sent4: She organized the pantry housewifely, like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Her sewing was done housewifely, with neat stitches and attention to detail.
